languageTools.program.agent.validation.agentfile

Class NameSpaceValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • languageTools.program.agent.validation.Validator<NameSpace>
      • languageTools.program.agent.validation.agentfile.NameSpaceValidator

  • public class NameSpaceValidator
extends Validator<NameSpace>
    Validator for RuleSets.
    Errors and warnings are generated by the RuleValidator used to validate individual Rules. Does not validate any modules that may be used by any of the rules; ModuleValidator should handle that.
    Author:
    N.Kraayenbrink
